belongs_to_collection.name: Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video The Movie Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ The Movie 2
overview: The second work of a psychic documentary that approaches the mystery of a person who died suddenly after watching the video "Unhappiness occurs when you see it."
tagline: Can you look directly at the truth projected by the camera?
title: Really! Cursed Video: The Movie 2
